application_sended.eng: I will inform the elders of your arrival at Hawkband. Verification of the application may take some time. Thanks for the answers,

form_confirmed_ally.eng: Your verification application has been confirmed by the elders. Welcome, friend of the hawks!

form_rejected_ally.eng: Your verification application has been rejected by the elders. Perhaps the clan you indicated in the application isn't our ally.
